channel.title: Uxui on Masaki Iwabuchi
channel.description: Recent content in Uxui on Masaki Iwabuchi

item.title: C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES
item.description: -- C-EP CONSUMER SERVICES Service and UX/UI Design | 2017, Professiona Work Objective After the deregulation, which direction should the electric power company aim for? In 2016, full-scale deregulation of the electricity industry in Japan has begun, and a lot of new and emerging companies have entered the electricity market. Chubu Electric Power Company (C-EPCO), a Japanese electricity utility provider for the mid-Chubu region of Honshu island, Japan, must shift to a new paradigm of customer service in order to improve its retention capability.

item.title: MTA Metrocard Redesign
item.description: -- MTA Metrocard Redesign UX/UI Design | 2018, Private Work *This project is still ongoing Objective How might we make NYC’s subway riding experience more comfortable? The NYC metrocard system has remained unchanged for decades and users of NYC subway sometimes have uncomfortable experiences especially the entrance of subway; the lost time of waiting in line to buy a metrocard, touching a dirty machine and so on.

item.title: Uber UX RESEARCH AND DESIGN
item.description: -- UBER UX RESEARCH AND DESIGN UX/UI Design | 2015, Academic Work Objective How can we improve the experience of Uber drivers? Joined 5 weeks MFA Interaction Design Program of User Research Methods in SVA, US. Woriking in teams, we’ve joined a real project with Uber and proposed UX to solve current issues. I’ve learned the fundamentals of user research techniques and the sense of UX in collaboration with global students.

item.title: IBM Watson cognitive enterprise app
item.description: -- IBM Watson cognitive enterprise app Enterprise Application Design | 2016, Professional Work Overview IBM Watson cognitive application We delivered an initial phase of a cognitive Watson Advisor solution using agile engineering approach. MHI engineers can inspect and take action for risks of their projects in advance without long industry experience. They reduced the time taken by the worker’s task by 30% as a result. Clients needs ‘‘innovative and unique UI’’ to show brand-new experience internally, so we experimented various UIs with real users and applied the unique interaction inspired by the cube.
